A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I guess the director of this movie believes in rewriting or ignoring history\, huh?  This movie just pisses on everything that comes before it.  And\, not just The Force Awakens\, but the original triology as well.  He rewrote Luke's character and history and completely gave a big middle finger to every story line TFA set up.

Well\, how's that working for you?  Lowest ratings by audience of all Star Wars movies and that includes the prequels.  

Moral of the story: Don't shit on your golden egg.
